item.title: Ladder Capital Corp 10-K
item.description: Ladder Capital Corp, which is in the Real Estate Investment Trusts [6798] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 13, 2023 had 61446 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 882 instances may - 655 instances december - 638 instances 31 - 623 instances loan - 501 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
